param.name: email_approved_title
param.label: Approved title
param.description: Email title to send when a video has been approved

param.name: email_approved_body
param.label: Approved body
param.description:
Email body to send when a video has been approved.

Keywords:
~LINK~ - Direct link to video
~COMMENT~ - any comments made by the moderator
param.default:
Hello,
Thank you for uploading to Arc TV.
The moderators have now approved your video and it is live on the website: ~LINK~
The Arc TV Moderators

param.description: Email title to send when a video has been rejected

param.name: email_rejected_body
param.label: Approved body
param.description:
Email body to send when a video has been rejected.

Keywords:
~LINK~ - Direct link to video
~COMMENT~ - any comments made by the moderator
param.default:
Hello,
Thanks for uploading to Arc TV.
Unfortunately your video has not been approved at this time because:
~COMMENT~
You can edit the film and then resubmit it: ~LINK~
If you have any other questions do let us know.
The Arc TV Moderators
